results.quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.

results.quote: He who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe, is as good as dead his eyes are closed.

results.quote: I do not believe in the God of theology who rewards good and punishes evil.

results.quote: You ask me if I keep a notebook to record my great ideas. I've only ever had one.

results.quote: Most people say that it is the intellect which makes a great scientist. They are wrong: it is character.

results.quote: It gives me great pleasure indeed to see the stubbornness of an incorrigible nonconformist warmly acclaimed.

results.quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin what else does a man need to be happy?

results.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.

results.quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.

results.quote: I cannot imagine a God who rewards and punishes the objects of his creation and is but a reflection of human frailty.

results.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.

results.quote: To raise new questions, new possibilities, to regard old problems from a new angle, requires creative imagination and marks real advance in science.

results.quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.

results.quote: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination.

results.quote: In the first place, God made idiots. That was for practice. Then he made school boards.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Thunder is good, thunder is impressive but it is lightning that does the work.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Golf is a good walk spoiled.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Good breeding consists in concealing how much we think of ourselves and how little we think of the other person.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Prophesy is a good line of business, but it is full of risks.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: There are several good protections against temptation, but the surest is cowardice.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: To be good is noble but to show others how to be good is nobler and no trouble.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Few things are harder to put up with than the annoyance of a good example.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: What a good thing Adam had. When he said a good thing he knew nobody had said it before.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: We have the best government that money can buy.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Loyalty to the country always. Loyalty to the government when it deserves it.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Laws control the lesser man... Right conduct controls the greater one.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: My mother had a great deal of trouble with me, but I think she enjoyed it.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: That deep emotional conviction of the presence of a superior reasoning power, which is revealed in the incomprehensible universe, forms my idea of God.

results.quote: God always takes the simplest way.

results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Ignorance is the curse of God knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: What a piece of work is a man, how noble in reason, how infinite in faculties, in form and moving how express and admirable, in action how like an angel, in apprehension how like a god.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: O God, O God, how weary, stale, flat, and unprofitable seem to me all the uses of this world!
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: Prophesy is a good line of business, but it is full of risks.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: A man's character may be learned from the adjectives which he habitually uses in conversation.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, made a man what he ought to be.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: My idea of good company is the company of clever, well-informed people who have a great deal of conversation that is what I call good company.

results.quote: I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal.

results.quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.

results.quote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
results.author: John C. Maxwell

results.quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
results.author: Zig Ziglar

results.quote: I've always taught that a poor economy is the best opportunity for salespeople because the naysayers and grumblers have already given up, leaving more territory, more opportunities to be successful than in a good economy when virtually all salespeople are out there, giving it their best.
results.author: Zig Ziglar

results.quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
results.author: Zig Ziglar

results.quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
results.author: Zig Ziglar

results.quote: I believe that being successful means having a balance of success stories across the many areas of your life. You can't truly be considered successful in your business life if your home life is in shambles.
results.author: Zig Ziglar

results.quote: Confusion of goals and perfection of means seems, in my opinion, to characterize our age.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
results.author: Unknown

results.quote: Time flies like an arrow. Fruit flies like an orange.
results.author: Unknown

results.quote: And this, our life, exempt from public haunt, finds tongues in trees, books in the running brooks, sermons in stones, and good in everything.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: There is a tide in the affairs of men, Which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune. Omitted, all the voyage of their life is bound in shallows and in miseries. On such a full sea are we now afloat. And we must take the current when it serves, or lose our ventures.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Life is as tedious as twice-told tale, vexing the dull ear of a drowsy man.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Life every man holds dear but the dear man holds honor far more precious dear than life.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: I bear a charmed life.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Absence from those we love is self from self - a deadly banishment.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Love to faults is always blind, always is to joy inclined. Lawless, winged, and unconfined, and breaks all chains from every mind.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Speak low, if you speak love.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Love is too young to know what conscience is.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Love is not love that alters when it alteration finds.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: The love of heaven makes one heavenly.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: They do not love that do not show their love.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Many a good hanging prevents a bad marriage.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Faced with what is right, to leave it undone shows a lack of courage.
results.author: Confucius

results.quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.

results.quote: There are three methods to gaining wisdom. The first is reflection, which is the highest. The second is limitation, which is the easiest. The third is experience, which is the bitterest.

results.quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.

results.quote: Perfection of means and confusion of ends seem to characterize our age.

results.quote: Reading, after a certain age, diverts the mind too much from its creative pursuits. Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.

results.quote: Confusion of goals and perfection of means seems, in my opinion, to characterize our age.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.

results.quote: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: We shape our buildings thereafter they shape us.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: Broadly speaking, the short words are the best, and the old words best of all.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: In war as in life, it is often necessary when some cherished scheme has failed, to take up the best alternative open, and if so, it is folly not to work for it with all your might.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: Short words are best and the old words when short are best of all.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: The short words are best, and the old words are the best of all.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: I am certainly not one of those who need to be prodded. In fact, if anything, I am the prod.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: Politics is not a game. It is an earnest business.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: To improve is to change to be perfect is to change often.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: The highest art is always the most religious, and the greatest artist is always a devout person.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: The things I want to know are in books my best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: I never had a policy I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: In giving freedom to the slave, we assure freedom to the free - honorable alike in what we give and what we preserve. We shall nobly save, or meanly lose, the last best hope of earth.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: Common looking people are the best in the world: that is the reason the Lord makes so many of them.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: Discourage litigation. Persuade your neighbors to compromise whenever you can. As a peacemaker the lawyer has superior opportunity of being a good man. There will still be business enough.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: We allow our ignorance to prevail upon us and make us think we can survive alone, alone in patches, alone in groups, alone in races, even alone in genders.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: It is through art, and through art only, that we can realise our perfection.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: While I know myself as a creation of God, I am also obligated to realize and remember that everyone else and everything else are also God's creation.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: A man loves the meat in his youth that he cannot endure in his age.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: The golden age is before us, not behind us.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: There's no art to find the mind's construction in the face.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: But men are men the best sometimes forget.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Faith, there hath been many great men that have flattered the people who ne'er loved them.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: Things done well and with a care, exempt themselves from fear.
results.author: William Shakespeare

results.quote: We allow our ignorance to prevail upon us and make us think we can survive alone, alone in patches, alone in groups, alone in races, even alone in genders.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: The need for change bulldozed a road down the center of my mind.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues, because without courage you can't practice any other virtue consistently. You can practice any virtue erratically, but nothing consistently without courage.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: History, despite its wrenching pain, cannot be unlived, but if faced with courage, need not be lived again.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: One isn't necessarily born with courage, but one is born with potential. Without courage, we cannot practice any other virtue with consistency. We can't be kind, true, merciful, generous, or honest.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: My mother said I must always be intolerant of ignorance but understanding of illiteracy. That some people, unable to go to school, were more educated and more intelligent than college professors.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: Woman is fine for her own satisfaction alone. No man will admire her the more, no woman will like her the better for it. Neatness and fashion are enough for the former, and a something of shabbiness or impropriety will be most endearing to the latter.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: One man's ways may be as good as another's, but we all like our own best.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: We do not look in our great cities for our best morality.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: Business, you know, may bring you money, but friendship hardly ever does.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: Give a girl an education and introduce her properly into the world, and ten to one but she has the means of settling well, without further expense to anybody.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: Men have had every advantage of us in telling their own story. Education has been theirs in so much higher a degree the pen has been in their hands. I will not allow books to prove anything.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: Selfishness must always be forgiven you know, because there is no hope of a cure.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
results.author: Jane Austen

results.quote: Business, you know, may bring you money, but friendship hardly ever does.
results.author: Jane Austen
